en:
严惩
(Yánchéng)

Punish severely

Definitions of 严惩
[ 简体中文 -> English ]

verb
    punish severely
        严惩, 严办, 非常严厉

adjective
    grueling
        严罚, 严惩
    gruelling
        严罚, 严惩

(Yánchéng)
